summary: A director is filming on location in a house where seven murders were committed. The caretaker warns them not to mess with things they do not understand (the murders were occult related), ... See full summary »
cast: John Ireland|Faith Domergue|John Carradine|Carole Wells|Charles Macaulay|Jerry Strickler|Ron Foreman|Dennis Record|Marty Hornstein|Charles Bail|Lucy Doheny|Jo Anne Mower|Ronald Víctor García|Jeff Alexander|Wells Bond|Laurie Bartram
title: La casa de los siete cadáveres
